title: An Act relative to internet gaming

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Muradian of Grafton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4431) of David K. Muradian, Jr., relative to internet gaming.  Economic Development and Emerging Technologies.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies

related_entities.name: committee on Economic Development and Emerging Technologies
